## HashAsPubKeyHex() function

Converts a Hash28ByteBase16 to an Ed25519PublicKeyHex format.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function HashAsPubKeyHex(hash: Hash28ByteBase16): Ed25519PublicKeyHex;
```

</td><td>

The hash to be converted.


</td></tr>
